Package com.xebisco.yield

Class SystemBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.SystemBehavior
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Behavior, DefaultAxis, Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExitWithEscapeKey, PhysicsSystem, ToggleFullScreenSystem
    public abstract class SystemBehavior
extends java.lang.Object
implements Behavior
    This is an abstract class that implements the Behavior interface and contains methods for managing scenes.
